name: MAIL RUN (TheoClarke)
description:
Made in 3 1/2 hours for Trijam #132, the jam theme was "Package Delivered".

Deliver packages while avoiding the dogs in this simple top-down 3D runner game.

  • Press UP + DOWN arrows keys to move up and down.
  • Hit the mail boxes to deliver packages and score points.
  • Avoid the dogs or it's game over!
  • Deliver as many packages as possible!

All gameplay and art was made by me during the jam time. I made the game in Unity, with 3D models made in Maya. The music is from one of my old projects.
